meaningMnemonic: Something comes out of a <kanji>womb</kanji> and is then put on a <kanji>tray</kanji>. It's the <vocabulary>afterbirth</vocabulary>. Yeah, yeah, eww. Grow up, it's a word you should know.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
